author: Krassimir Kossev
releaseNotes:
1.0.15 2022-12-03 - OWON 0x0406 cluster binding; added _TZE204_ztc6ggyl _TZE200_ar0slwnd _TZE200_sfiy5tfs _TZE200_mrf6vtua (was wrongly 3in1) mmWave radards;
1.0.14 2022-10-31 - added Bond motion sensor ZX-BS-J11W
1.0.13 2022-09-25 - added _TZE200_jva8ink8 AUBESS radar; 2-in-1 Sensitivity setting bug fix
1.0.12 2022-09-22 - added _TZE200_wukb7rhc MOES radar
1.0.11 2022-08-22 - IAS devices initialization improvements; presence threshold increased to 4 hours; 3in1 exceptions bug fixes; 3in1 and 4in1 exceptions bug fixes;
1.0.10 2022-08-15 - added Lux threshold parameter; square black radar LED configuration is resent back when device is powered on; round black PIR sensor powerSource is set to DC; added OWON OCP305 Presence Sensor
1.0.9 2022-08-11 - degrees Celsius symbol bug fix; added square black radar _TZE200_0u3bj3rc support, temperatureOffset bug fix; decimal/number type prferences bug fix
